channel.title: Food Operator
channel.description: A podcast dedicated to food and the music it inspires. Each episode I'll call on a different person to share a recipe, restaurant, or some other food experience with us. Join in and listen to Food Operator - a virtual bottomless pit of possibilities!
channel.itunes:author: foodoperator@ameliaray.net (Amelia Ray)
channel.itunes:subtitle: Food Operator is a podcast dedicated to food and the music it inspires.
channel.itunes:summary: Food Operator is a podcast dedicated to food and the music it inspires. Each episode I'll call on a different person to share a recipe, restaurant, or some other food experience with us. Join in and listen to Food Operator - a virtual bottomless pit of possibilities!
